Html:
DirectoryLookup to load the modules dynamically is helpfule but not completely.

It assumes that you are going to keep all your modules in a single directory which might not be the case in a real world scenario.

Looking at the current implementation it looks like we can not specify multiple locations to look for the modules to be loaded.

What are the ways to achieve this? Has anybody (Prism Contrib) already achieved this?

You inputs would really help.
